name: DungeonSlash
description:
DungeonSlash is a Dungeon Crawler (Grinder) 

Save the Princess and kill the bad guy in the deeper dungeon levels
Beta 1.00

Teleport Book
Items can be sold to the wizard.
305 enemys
Deep very deep dungeons.
A store with 20 slots
147 Items.

To sell loot, go close to the Wizard and click him. Then click the items in the inventory to sell them.

To buy Items, go close to the Trader and click him. Then click the items in the store that pops up.

Items can be used by clicking them when they are in the inventory.

Move the mouse over the items and caught enemy's, in the inventory, to get a description of them

To gain a quest, go near the Monk. Click the monk
To gain a quest, go near the Collector. Click the Collector

The Trader is on the left, the Wizard is on the right.
The Monk is on the left, the Collector is on the right

The Blue Book is the teleport magic.
The Iron pick is needed to cut away some walls. They give each 15 hits for cutting down walls. Be carefull with them.

55 items in the shop!
147 items in the dungeons!
305 enemy's!
267 quests!
300 dungeons and beyond... 

At the start of the game, buy some weapons and shields (helmets, harnesses). Click them when they are in the inventory, then you are building up sword strength and defence strength. Don't forget the pick to cut walls and some pixie dust to restore health.

When using the teleport book in the dungeon brings you back to the wizard. To teleport back to the dungeon click the pentagram. When using the stairs to go to level 1 will destroy the teleport magic action.

------------------------------------------------------------

Enemy and hero sprites made by David Gervais.

Enjoy.
